OmniGeometry Online Version

Thanks for the incredible love and support. You created an awesome program and I love integrating it into my workflow. Your hard work has solved a very tedious portion of my work! I'm fascinated by the vast possibilities/potentials the software provides. Thanks for your wonderful work, I'm sure it's helping many people.  

Karmora Jones

ArtSoldier77

Just wanted to officially thank Omni for creating a program that has sparked an artistic creativity in myself that I never knew was possible.  Your program is beyond incredible and my appreciation for you is infinite!  

Brandon Lannuzzi
